name: leave_application_form
title: Leave Application Form
description: Comprehensive leave request form with approvals and documentation

validation.message: Employee ID must be in format EMP1234

fields.label: Employee Name
fields.tooltip: Auto-populated from employee database

fields.label: Direct Manager Email
fields.tooltip: This will be used for approval notifications

fields.label: Leave Start Date
fields.tooltip: Select the first day of leave

fields.label: Leave End Date
fields.tooltip: Select the last day of leave

fields.label: Total Leave Days
fields.tooltip: Automatically calculated excluding weekends

fields.label: Remaining Leave Balance
fields.tooltip: Current available leave balance

fields.label: Half Day Request
fields.tooltip: Check if this is a half-day leave request

fields.label: Reason for Leave
fields.placeholder: Please provide detailed reason for leave request

fields.label: Work Handover Information
fields.placeholder: Describe work handover arrangements and coverage plans

fields.label: Supporting Documents
fields.tooltip: Upload medical certificates, travel documents, or other supporting files

fields.label: Medical Certificate Required
fields.text: I understand that medical certificate is mandatory for sick leave exceeding 3 days

fields.label: Employee Digital Signature
fields.tooltip: Please sign to confirm the accuracy of information provided

name: manager_approval_form
title: Manager Leave Approval Form
description: Manager review and approval form for leave applications

fields.label: Application Reference ID
fields.tooltip: Auto-generated application reference

fields.label: Leave Duration
fields.tooltip: Start date to end date with total days

fields.label: Team Availability During Leave Period
fields.tooltip: Assess team coverage during the requested leave period

fields.label: Workload Impact Assessment
fields.tooltip: Rate the impact on various work areas

fields.label: Alternative Work Arrangements
fields.tooltip: Select applicable alternative arrangements if full leave cannot be approved

fields.label: Coverage Plan Details
fields.placeholder: Describe how work will be covered during the leave period

fields.label: Manager Decision
fields.tooltip: Select your decision on this leave application

fields.label: Approval Conditions
fields.placeholder: Specify any conditions for approval (e.g., specific dates, work completion requirements)

fields.label: Reason for Rejection
fields.placeholder: Provide detailed reason for rejection and suggest alternatives if possible

fields.label: HR Escalation Details
fields.placeholder: Explain why this application requires HR review

fields.label: Application Priority Level
fields.tooltip: 1 = Low Priority, 5 = Urgent

fields.label: Additional Manager Notes
fields.placeholder: Any additional comments, suggestions, or information for HR or employee

fields.label: Manager Digital Signature
fields.tooltip: Sign to confirm your review and decision

fields.label: Estimated Productivity Impact (%)
fields.tooltip: Estimate percentage impact on team/project productivity

name: hr_final_approval_form
title: HR Final Approval & Policy Review
description: HR department final review, policy compliance check, and system integration form

fields.label: Employee Summary
fields.tooltip: Employee name, ID, department, and position

fields.label: Policy Compliance Checklist
options: Minimum notice period met (varies by leave type)
fields.tooltip: Check all applicable policy requirements that have been verified

fields.label: Policy Violations Identified
fields.placeholder: List any policy violations or concerns identified during review

fields.label: Current Leave Balance
fields.tooltip: Current available leave balance from HR system

fields.label: Negative Balance Approval
fields.tooltip: Required when leave request would result in negative balance

fields.label: Leave Accrual Adjustment
fields.tooltip: Any monetary adjustment for leave accrual or payout

fields.label: Payroll Deduction Required
fields.tooltip: Toggle if unpaid leave requires payroll deduction

fields.label: Benefits Impact Assessment
fields.tooltip: Assess impact on employee benefits during leave period

fields.label: Expected Return to Work Date
fields.tooltip: Expected date for employee return - used for payroll planning

fields.label: System Integration Updates
fields.tooltip: Select systems that need to be updated for this leave

fields.label: Approval Modifications
fields.placeholder: Describe the modifications to the original leave request

fields.label: Conditional Approval Requirements
fields.placeholder: List specific conditions that must be met for final approval

fields.label: Detailed Rejection Reason
fields.placeholder: Provide comprehensive reason for rejection and any appeal process information

fields.label: Escalation Justification
fields.placeholder: Explain why this case requires senior management review

fields.label: HR Processing Notes
fields.placeholder: Internal HR notes, special considerations, or follow-up actions required

fields.label: HR Officer Name
fields.tooltip: Name of HR officer processing this application

fields.label: HR Officer Digital Signature
fields.tooltip: Digital signature to authorize the final decision

fields.label: Audit Trail Notes
fields.placeholder: Additional notes for audit and compliance purposes
fields.tooltip: Internal notes for audit trail and compliance documentation

name: support_ticket_submission
title: Support Ticket Submission
description: Submit a support request with detailed information for sentiment analysis and prioritization

fields.label: Email Address
fields.tooltip: We'll use this to send updates about your ticket

fields.label: Phone Number
fields.tooltip: Optional - for urgent issues requiring immediate contact

fields.label: Detailed Description
fields.placeholder: Please provide a detailed description of your issue, including steps to reproduce if applicable
fields.tooltip: The more detail you provide, the better we can help resolve your issue

options.label: Low - Can wait a few days
High - Business critical, needs immediate attention

fields.label: Business Impact
fields.tooltip: Select all that apply - helps us prioritize your request

fields.label: Expected Resolution Date
fields.tooltip: When do you need this resolved by?

fields.label: Attachments
fields.tooltip: Screenshots, error logs, or other relevant files

fields.label: Error Logs or Code Snippets
fields.placeholder: Paste error messages, stack traces, or relevant code here
fields.tooltip: Include any error messages or code that might help diagnose the issue

fields.label: Previous Support Experience
fields.tooltip: Rate your previous experience with our support team

name: sentiment_analysis_review
title: Sentiment Analysis & Review
description: Automated sentiment analysis results with manual review and adjustment capabilities

fields.label: AI Sentiment Score
fields.tooltip: AI-detected sentiment: -1 (very negative) to +1 (very positive)

fields.label: AI Sentiment Classification
fields.tooltip: Automated classification based on sentiment analysis

fields.label: Detected Keywords
fields.tooltip: Key phrases and emotions detected by AI

fields.label: Review Notes
fields.placeholder: Explain why you disagree with the AI assessment or provide additional context

fields.label: Escalation Required
fields.tooltip: Toggle if this ticket requires immediate escalation

fields.label: Reviewer Signature
fields.tooltip: Digital signature confirming your review
